title: Through the Lens of Ramune
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>Hey, won’t the marble break if you push it that hard? Is it really okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Don’t you know how to drink ramune? It’s fine, it won’t break. You’re just like my sisters, worrying about something like that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....You never know for sure. Also, don’t treat me like a child.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Well, to me, you’re no different than Cocoa and Cocoro.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....Sure then. I’m already taller than you, so I’ll let you have the age factor, Nico-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Whaaaaaaaat did you sa-.... Kyaah!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>The ramune is spilling out! Nico-chan, handkerchief!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Ahaha! Well, this is part of the fun with ramune! Come on, open yours, Maki.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Okay.... Kyaaaah!? Geez~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You say that, but you have a big grin on your face right now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Fufu. Well, I guess it is fun. Alright, let’s drink it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
